languages.text: "Выпороть чиновников и отправить в шахты, а новую администрацию набрать из заключенных".
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."
languages.original_text: "Выпороть чиновников и отправить в шахты, а новую администрацию набрать из заключенных".

traits.locale_text: "Punish the administration and send it to the mines, then gather the new administration members from the prisoners."
"Punish the administration and send it to the mines, then gather the new administration members from the prisoners."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."
"Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."

languages.text: “惩罚监狱所有的管理者管理者，把他们丢到矿井里，之后从囚犯之中召集新的管理人员。”
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: “惩罚监狱所有的管理者管理者，把他们丢到矿井里，之后从囚犯之中召集新的管理人员。”

languages.text: «Castigad a toda la administración de la prisión y enviadlos a las minas, luego elegid a los nuevos administradores entre la población reclusa».
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: «Castigad a toda la administración de la prisión y enviadlos a las minas, luego elegid a los nuevos administradores entre la población reclusa».

languages.text: 「刑務所の管理層全員を罰して鉱山に送り込め。新しい管理者を監獄内から集めることにする」
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: 「刑務所の管理層全員を罰して鉱山に送り込め。新しい管理者を監獄内から集めることにする」

languages.text: « Châtiez tout le personnel administratif de cette prison en les envoyant aux mines, puis désignez de nouveaux administrateurs parmi les détenus. »
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: « Châtiez tout le personnel administratif de cette prison en les envoyant aux mines, puis désignez de nouveaux administrateurs parmi les détenus. »

languages.text: "Bestraft die gesamte Gefängnisverwaltung und schickt sie in die Minen. Rekrutiert dann aus den Gefangenen die neuen Verwalter."
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then gather the new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: "Bestraft die gesamte Gefängnisverwaltung und schickt sie in die Minen. Rekrutiert dann aus den Gefangenen die neuen Verwalter."

languages.text: "Tüm hapishane idaresini cezalandırıp madenlere gönderin. Yerlerine de hapishanedekilerin arasından yeni idareciler seçin."
languages.original_text: "Punish the whole prison administration and send them to the mines, then select new administrators from the prison population."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm hapishane idaresini cezalandırıp madenlere gönderin. Yerlerine de hapishanedekilerin arasından yeni idareciler seçin."
